bio: Catch Life On-chain: Bridging normies & Degens. Simplifying tech, enriching culture. Join us!"
contributionDescription: 75,000 OP for the construction and enhancement of the podcast show "Catch Life on Chain". The allocated funds will primarily be utilized for educational purposes, market promotion, giveaways, and organizing events aimed at attracting a larger audience

contributionLinks.description: instagram page where documentation will be aligned

impactDescription: Haven't received any funding, we'll do some deep diving and research into our next couple podcast episode's topic. Once we've gathered all the information, we'll work together to structure and draft the script, ensuring it's engaging and insightful for our listeners. Then, we'll collectively gear up the technical elements required for recording and editing. With everything set up, we'll go ahead and record the episode. After post-production, we'll put all our efforts into marketing and promoting, boosting our listener-ship. These are the steps we, as a team, will follow.
pwCategorySuggestions: Content Creation, Community Building, Media Production
